conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true isometric/cutaway 3D model with extruded walls, visible thickness, multiple wall faces (top/side), and removed ceiling exposing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion and readable volumes; clean cutaway and corner geometry. Minor simplification in some wall/top-edge detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacency match (3 bedrooms, living/dining + deck, kitchen/utility, multiple toilets, home office). Relative proportions and major wall placements appear consistent; some door/opening positions and exact partition lengths are not fully verifiable and appear slightly simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present in bedrooms and living/dining; kitchen counters/appliances represented; bathroom fixtures present. Some rooms use simplified block layouts and not all minor fixtures/details match the 2D plan exactly.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clear and readable with good separation of walls/floors/openings. Lighting is adequate but somewhat flat. Text labels inside the 3D view reduce presentation cleanliness.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window/opening placements and proportions appear simplified compared to the 2D plan (exact swings and sizes not consistently replicated).
Text labels are present within the 3D render, reducing presentation cleanliness per rubric.

summary: A clear and faithful isometric cutaway 3D conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, with only minor simplifications in openings and presentation labels.
